content: QuoteCurrently we depend on suppliers and banks to be able to pay for products and services, as well as the fact of transferring money, Neves alleges. This is something that makes the service tied to its corporate rules, costs and government regulators, which is not the case with Bitcoin with the Lightning network, she adds.For people who are not related to the subject, this technology called Lightning Network is basically a decentralized network for instant micropayments and high volume of transactions that eliminates the risk of delegating the custody of funds to trusted third parties, achieving its objective, which is that payments are free. I know that it fulfills the same function that blockchain technology applies, but the difference is that with blockchain, the transmission and validation of these transactions is slow and expensive due to the intrinsic limitations of these networks.Image: https://masterethereum.com/lightning-network-master-blockcain-onlineI want to emphasize that the purpose of all this is not only free payments but also between people. Making it possible for anyone to send money to any country, no matter where they are, giving an example, entities such as the same way to send an email, with that ease, since currently everyone knows how to send an email being so easy and fast. . But in order for them to do this, interoperability is being worked on (it is the ability of a digital financial services account to carry out the type of necessary transactions in which two or more providers participate). Since local money does not qualify for this approach since they are nationals and cannot operate abroad, BTC is the best option considering that all of this would be easier if everyone used it.Information Extracted from: https://journaltime.org/finance/corporate-finance/the-world-needs-bitcoin-a-global-and-free-currency-says-a-specialist-at-mit/

comments.body: Quote from: Tytanowy Janusz on May 08, 2022, 07:31:11 AMThere are pros and cons using lightning network and a lot of this is being descused in this thread:The Lightning Network FAQMany specialists that know every inch of this technology watch this thread so if anyone have any question its the best place to find good answer.Interesting article, thanks for sharing. Although we keep discussing that how lightening network could ease the process of sending money which is almost instantaneous and borderless then also there are few roadblocks! The process still seeks for inter and intranet to send over the money and get confirmation within nodes. Peeps keep saying it does not matter in which country are they, where they reside etc, we can send over the money easily. True, that can be done with SWIFT too, the real question is when we will have offline nodes? For example, send the money over cellular network, get the nodes generated offline, and once whenever connected to the network the transactions could be synch and master node formed. This is what they do with the VISA and MasterCard actually. They rely on the third party services who will clear the payments in real time in fraction of seconds and then synch the data with former companies. I just see it as another network in crypto space with same limitations as using bitcoin or eth or any coin.
